name: MyLove
0:
”Alexa, ask My Love”
”Alexa, ask My Love to add you have beautiful eyes”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my love
des:
My Love gives you a great way to create a list of personalized messages that can later be randomly read back whenever your partner feels the need.

Your wife missing you while you are out of town?
"Alexa, ask My Love"
 "I love it the way you smile when you and Lexi do bath time."

If your partner has a specific one they want to hear, just ask for it by number.

"Alexa, ask My Love 12"

Unlike other apps, MyLove allows you to create your own custom messages - as many as you want. You create the list using the standard Alexa List voice commands or you can type them in using the Alexa app.

My Love uses the list called 'My Love', which it will create for you the first time you use the app if it doesn't already exist. You can also add items to the list using your voice by saying:

"Alexa, ask My Love to add you have beautiful eyes"

Note: While you can add items using your voice, you will find it faster and more accurate to add them using the Alexa app's List manager and adding/removing items from the list named 'My Love.'
